attributes.action: Ask the German Government to legalise Home Education in Germany
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Germany is the only country in Europe where it is illegal to teach you children at home.  Currently the Neubronner family in Bremen are facing a fine of 4,500 Euros or possible imprisonment of the father because this family just want to home educate their children in the same way we are allowed to do in the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
